post_summaries.description: The image is a digital illustration with a Ghibli-esque style, depicting a bleak future scenario. In the background, there are men cutting down trees, hunting with guns, and eating meat. In the foreground, there are animals like bears, pigs, cows, and rabbits. A large man in a suit is biting into the Earth, while two children below him are eating meat. A white dove flies above. The overall tone is cautionary and critical of environmental destruction and animal exploitation.
The image shows a man squatting down and feeding a black dog. The hashtags in the post are #animal and #animalcare.
The image shows a donkey carrying heavy loads in baskets. The post is advocating for animal rights and veganism, highlighting the burden placed on animals used for labor.

The Instagram post by manjeet_sehrawat_vegan features a video of a man speaking about Holi and veganism. The post also includes hashtags related to veganism, animal rights, compassion, and specific spiritual figures like Acharya Prashant, Osho, and Krishnamurti.

The image shows a man in a push-up position, presumably about to perform a set of push-ups. The text overlay indicates he aims to do 1010 pushups without stopping, and the hashtag #plantpowered suggests he's vegan. The caption is in Hindi and promotes veganism for health and ethical reasons.

The image is a screenshot of an Instagram post by @manjeet_sehrawat_vegan. The post features a video of cows in what appears to be a slaughterhouse ("Kasai Mandi" is written on the video). The text in the video asks if seeing this will make people stop drinking milk. The caption expresses strong opinions against the dairy industry, using terms like "cruel" and "milkismurder," and promotes veganism.
